name: MazeBreakout Official
description:
Objective:  You are in a maze. You have a gun in your hands.  What do you do? Kill zombies until you win, or die. Good Luck

_________________________________________________________

Controls:  AD- Move Left or right, W- Jump,  Left click (Mouse) - Shoot,  R- Reset game, Esc- Exits game. 

Codes Made By: Danial

Music Made By: Youhanna

Characters/Background made by: Eunsoo 

___________________________________________________________________________________

Need:  To have tab/page  full screen to play properly and rationally.

It is advisable to use headphones and a mouse, might experience lag, if do refresh the page.  If you restart or press the button "R" game will be harder as music will worsen. Don't ask about the gun's rotation, will be fixed later...

                      Game is still in development, official release coming soon!

Official release will include:

More mazes, Harder enemies....

Game made by GameMakerStudio 2.
